Title.language: Doxology for Archangel Michael for the Resurrection

language.div: Doksologi untuk Malaikat Agung Mikhael di Kebangkitan

text.language: Cat~a~nactacic n~te P,#c#: n~je nihio~mi m~faicojen: aui~ aukw] qen ouc~poud/: afouwnh nwou n~je Mi,a/l.
At the Resurrection of Christ, the women carrying fragrant oil, came and sought earnestly, and Michael appeared to them.

language.div: Di Kebangkitan Kristus, / para wanita pembawa minyak wangi, / datang dan mencari dengan sungguh-sungguh, / dan Mikhael menampakkan diri kepada mereka.

text.language: عند قيامة المسيح توجهت النسوة حاملات الطيب وطلبن بإجتهاد فظهر لهن ميخائيل.
Pefc~mot de nafoi m~v~r/]: n~oucetebr/j n~ouwini: ouoh tefhebcw c~ouwbs: m~v~r/] n~ou,iwn.
His appearance became, illuminated like lightning, and his clothes, became white like snow.

language.div: Tampak bercahaya seperti kilat, dan pakaiannya putih seperti salju.

text.language: وكانت هيئته مثل البرق المنير ولباسه أبيض كالثلج.
Aferouw~ ouoh pejaf: n~nihio~mi m~faicojen: je v/etetenkw] n~cwf: aftwnf f~,/ m~pai ma an.
He answered and said, to the women carrying the fragrant oil, "Who are you looking for, He is risen He is not here."

language.div: Dia menjawab, katanya / kepada para wanita tersebut, / "Siapa yang kamu cari? / Ia telah bangkit, Ia tak ada di sini."

text.language: فاجاب وقال للنسوة حاملات الطيب ان الذى تطلبنه قد قام وليس ههنا.
Iwc ouoh masenwten: a~joc n~nefa~poctoloc: je aftwnf e~bol qen n/eymwout: kata v~r/] e~tafjoc nwten.
Now go quickly, tell His apostles, He has risen from the dead, as He said to you.

language.div: Pergilah segera, beritakan ke para rasul-Nya, Ia telah bangkit dari antara orang mati, seperti yang telah Ia katakan kepadamu.

text.language: إذهبن وأسرعن وقلن لرسله إنه قام من بين الأموات كما قال لكم.
Rasi je v/etafasf aftwnf: h/ppe f~naersorp e~rwten: e~]Galilea~ tetennau e~rof m~mau: je aijoc nwten.
Rejoice for He who was crucified, arose and goes before you, to Galilee there you will see Him, behold I have told you.

language.div: Bersukacitalah, sbab Ia yang disalibkan, / telah bangkit dan mendahuluimu, / ke Galilea, di sana kau 'kan melihat-Nya, / lihat, aku telah memberitahumu.

text.language: افرحوا لأن الذى صُلب قد قام وسيسبقكم إلى الجليل هناك ترونه هاقد قلت لكنّ.
Ounis] gar pe pektaio~: w~ Mi,a/l p~ar,wn n~na niv/oui: je n~yok e~takhisennoufi nan: qen ]a~nactacic m~Po#c#.
Great is your honor, O Michael the head of the heavenly, for you preached to us, the Resurrection of the Lord.

language.div: Besarlah kehormatanmu, wahai Mikhael kepala surgawi, sebab kau memberitakan kami, Kebangkitan Tuhan.

text.language: عظيمة هي كرامتك يا ميخائيل رئيس السمائيين لأنك أنت بشرتنا بقيامة الرب.
W c~taurwyic di /~mac: w~ P,#c# p~ouro n~te p~w~ou: a~nactac ektwn nekrwn: ouoh ak] nan m~pekounof.
O You who were crucified for us, O Christ the King of glory, You have risen from the dead, and granted us Your joy.

language.div: Wahai Engkau yang disalib demi kami, / ya Kristus Raja kemuliaan, / Engkau telah bangkit dari antara orang mati, / dan menganugerahkan sukacita-Mu bagi kami.

text.language: أيها المسيح ملك المجد المصلوب عنا قد قمت من بين الأموات ومنحتنا بهجتك.
Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pi'alpict/c n~te ]a~nactacic: Mi,a/l p~ar,wn n~na niv/oui: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O the Announcer of the Resurrection, Michael the head of the heavenly, that He may forgive us our sins.

language.div: Bersyafaatlah demi kami, wahai Pembawa Kabar Kebangkitan, Mikhael kepala surgawi, agar Dia mengampuni dosa-dosa kami.

text.language: إشفع فينا أيها المبوق بالقيامة ميخائيل رئيس السمائيين ليغفر لنا خطايانا.

comment.language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Michael:

text.language: Mi,a/l p~ar,wn n~na niv/oui: n~yof etoi n~sorp: qen nitaxic n~aggelikon: efsemsi m~pem~yo m~Po#c#.
Michael the head of the heavenly: he is the first: among the angelic ranks: serving before the Lord.

language.div: Mikhael, kepala surgawi, / dialah yang pertama, / di antara barisan malaikat, / melayani di hadapan Tuhan.

text.language: ميخائيل رئيس السمائيين هو الأول فى الطقوس الملائكية يخدم أمام الرب.
Sare V] ouwrp nan: n~nefnai nem nefmetsenh/t: hiten ni]ho n~te Mi,a/l: pinis] n~ar,/aggeloc.
God sends unto us: His mercy and compassion: through the supplications of Michael: the great archangel.

language.div: Allah kirimkan kita: rahmat dan belas kasih-Nya: melalui syafaat Mikhael: malaikat agung.

text.language: ان الله يرسل لنا مراحمه ورأفاته بسؤال ميخائيل رئيس الملائكة العظيم.
Saujwk e~bol n~je nikarpoc: hiten nentwbh m~Mi,a/l: je n~yof etqent e~qoun V]: ef]ho e~h~r/i e~jwn.
The harvest is perfected: through the prayers of Michael: for he is close to God, asking Him on our behalf.

language.div: Panen disempurnakan / melalui doa-doa Mikhael, / sebab ia dekat dengan Allah, / memohon demi kita.

text.language: وتكمل الأثمار بطلبات ميخائيل لأنه قريب إلى الله يسأل عنا.
Taio~ niben eynaneu: nem dwron niben etj/k e~bol: eun/ou nan e~bol m~p~swi: hiten Viwt n~te niouwini.
All good honor: and every perfect gift: comes to us from on high: from the Father of lights.

language.div: Semua kehormatan yang baik: dan setiap karunia sempurna: datang pada kita dari tempat tertinggi: Bapa segala terang.

text.language: كل عطية صالحة وكل موهبة تامة إنما تهبط لنا من فوق من عند أبى الأنوار.
Marenhwc n~ten]w~ou: n~tenouwst n~}t~riac e#y#u#: etoi n~o~mooucioc: eym/n e~bol sa e~neh.
Let us praise and glorify: and worship the Holy Trinity: one in essence: who abides forever.

language.div: Mari puji dan muliakan, / serta sembah Tritunggal Mahakudus, / satu dalam hakikat, / kekal selamanya.

text.language: فلنسبح ونمجد ونسجد للثالوث القدوس المساوي الدائم إلى الأبد.
